title.rendered: Tourism for Future -Training Certification Ceremony at Municipality of Kolašin

content.rendered:
Training Certification Ceremony at Municipality of Kolašin

Kolašin recently hosted a special ceremony to honor the completion of two important training modules as part of the Tourism for Future project. This event recognized the hard work and achievements of participants in learning about sustainable practices in the tourism industry.

 

The ceremony marked the successful culmination of two training modules, each designed to equip participants with crucial insights and expertise essential for fostering sustainability within the tourism sector. The completion of these modules not only symbolized a personal achievement for the participants but also represented a collective leap forward in integrating sustainable practices into the fabric of the tourism
